faq.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Trackbliss and digital product passports.
faq.dpp.q: What is a Digital Product Passport (DPP)?
faq.dpp.a: A Digital Product Passport is a structured digital record that contains information about a product's origin, composition, repair, and recycling options. Under the EU ESPR regulation, DPPs will become mandatory for many product categories starting 2026/2027. Trackbliss helps you create and manage DPPs that comply with all EU requirements.
faq.who.q: Who needs a Digital Product Passport?
faq.who.a: Any company selling physical products in the EU market will eventually need DPPs. The first product categories affected include textiles, electronics, batteries, and construction materials. If you manufacture, import, or distribute products in the EU, Trackbliss helps you stay ahead of the regulation.
faq.espr.q: What are the ESPR deadlines I need to know?
faq.espr.a: The EU Ecodesign for Sustainable Products Regulation (ESPR) was adopted in 2024. Delegated acts for specific product categories are expected from 2025-2027, with DPP requirements becoming enforceable 18 months after each delegated act. Trackbliss keeps you updated on all relevant deadlines and ensures your products are compliant before enforcement begins.
faq.ai.q: How does the AI compliance check work?
faq.ai.a: Our AI analyzes your product data against current EU regulations including ESPR, REACH, GPSR, Battery Regulation, PPWR, and RoHS. It generates a compliance score (0-100), identifies specific risks and violations, and provides an actionable improvement plan with priorities. Each check uses one AI credit.
faq.pricing.q: Is Trackbliss really free to start?
faq.pricing.a: Yes! The Free plan includes up to 5 products, 3 DPP templates, 3 AI credits per month, and QR code generation. No credit card required. You can upgrade to Pro or Enterprise at any time as your needs grow.
faq.returns.q: What is the Returns Hub module?
faq.returns.a: The Returns Hub is an add-on module for professional returns management. It includes a 12-step status workflow, ticket system, customer portal with self-service return registration, and workflow automation. It's available in three tiers: Starter, Professional, and Business.
faq.security.a: Trackbliss uses row-level security (RLS) for complete data isolation between tenants. All data is stored on EU servers, encrypted in transit and at rest. We are fully GDPR compliant. Enterprise plans include additional security features like custom domains and SSO.
faq.trial.q: Can I try Pro features before committing?
faq.trial.a: Yes, we offer a free trial of the Pro plan so you can explore all features including all 11 DPP templates, 25 AI credits, and multi-user access. No credit card required to start your trial.
